title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading, building and running large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK wrapping Ollama’s REST API for chat, embed, pull, push and list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers to interact with Ollama endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama LLM, embeddings and chat wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (now Open WebUI) that connects to local Ollama instances.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui: open-source ChatGPT-style interface for Ollama and OpenAI APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI tool that wraps Ollama with conversation memory and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for document Q&A.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, refactor and chat with Ollama models from within the editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama REST API with fluent builder syntax.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embeddings support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that uses Ollama for slash-command chat and thread-based conversations.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of curated Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma and more.
